title: 4.2 Master Challenge 3
question:
Create a web page and set the title as My Favorite Books.
◼ Create fi ve columns in the table with the following headers: Serial number, Book name, Author’s name, Edition and Brief summary.
◼ Create five rows in the table and enter the details for five books.
◼ Set cell spacing and cell padding attributes to 6 and 5, respectively.
◼ Set the table border size to 4 pixels and border color to Yellow. Table height should be 300 pixels and width should be 400 pixels.
◼ Align the table to the center of the web page.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
